reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app does declare the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that information is collected during a visit to the website and explains the types of information that may be gathered.
reply.reference: Information such as the type of browser being used, its operating system, and your IP address is gathered in order to enhance your online experience. The Site’s various mailing lists, downloads, special offers, contests, registration forms, and surveys may request that you give us contact information such as your name, mailing and/or e-mail address, demographic information such as your age and gender, and personal preference information. URL: https://www.dianabigham.com/pages/privacy-policy

source_documents.excerpt:
Privacy Policy
Diana Bigham (the “Company”) respects the privacy concerns of the users of its website, www.kajabi.com and the services provided therein (the “Site”). The Company thus provides this privacy statement to explain what information is gathered during a visit to the Site and how such information may be used.
Your use of the Company’s services and this site are also governed by those of Kajabi, LLC, a California limited liability company. Please also review the Kajabi® website Terms of ...

otherwise authorized by a user.
The Company may disclose user information in special cases when we have reason to believe that disclosing this information is necessary to identify, contact or bring legal action against someone who may be causing injury to or interference (either intentionally or unintentionally) with the Company’s rights or property, other users of the Site, or anyone else that could be harmed by such activities.
The Company may also be required to disclose personal information ...

used for a purpose that is materially different from the purpose(s) for which it was originally collected or subsequently authorized by you. If you wish to limit your personal data in either such way, or have other questions about how the Company may use your personal data, please contact us at [email protected] with the words “Privacy Request” in the subject line.
Your California Privacy Rights: California Civil Code Section 1798.83 permits California residents to request from companies conduct...

access or use the Site and/or our services, personal information about you may be transferred outside the country in which you are situated to these other locations. The Company’s policies ensure that such personal information is protected to the same standard when processed by any Company entity or office around the world. We also ensure that appropriate contracts containing standard data protection clauses approved by the European Commission to protect that information and the rights of indivi...

specific job (for example, customer service) are granted access to personally identifiable information. The computers/servers in which we store personally identifiable information are kept in a secure environment. We continually review all such measures and update them when appropriate. Unfortunately, no data transmission over the Internet can be guaranteed to be 100% secure. As a result, while we strive to protect your personal information, Company cannot ensure or warrant the security of any i...

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: Non-personal information such as the type of browser being used, operating system, and IP address; contact information like name, mailing and/or e-mail address; demographic information such as age and gender; personal preference information like preferred software and interests.

content: Non-personal information (browser type, operating system, IP address)
Contact information (name, mailing address, e-mail address)

reply.analysis: The privacy policy indicates the types of data collected when the app declares the collection, including non-personal information, contact information, demographic information, and personal preference information.
reply.reference: Information such as the type of browser being used, its operating system, and your IP address is gathered in order to enhance your online experience. The Site’s various mailing lists, downloads, special offers, contests, registration forms, and surveys may request that you give us contact information such as your name, mailing and/or e-mail address, demographic information such as your age and gender, and personal preference information such as your preferred software and interests. URL: https://www.dianabigham.com/pages/privacy-policy

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the company will use the information collected for legitimate business interests and may share it with business partners.
reply.reference: Information submitted at the time of submission will be used by the Company only as necessary for our legitimate business interests ... The Company may also share such information with our business and promotional partners to further those interests. Personally identifiable information is never sold or leased to any third parties. URL: https://www.dianabigham.com/pages/privacy-policy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can request the deletion of user account(s), email address, and related data, or opt out of certain uses of personal information by contacting the company.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users can request deletion of their account or email address, along with related data, and opt-out of certain uses of personal information by contacting the company. This indicates that users have the option to opt-out or delete data.
reply.reference: Users may also request that Company delete a user account(s) or, if you have not established a user account, your email address, and any related data at any time. If you wish to delete your user account(s), please email us at [email protected] with the words “Delete Account” in the subject line. If you do not have a user account and wish to delete your email address or other personally identifiable information that you might have provided through your use of the Site, any Games, and/or any Services, please email us at [email protected] with the words “Delete My Information” in the subject line. URL: https://www.dianabigham.com/pages/privacy-policy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions that third-parties who provide and/or publish content via the Company’s Kajabi® Service shall be deemed the data controllers for any personal data contained in the content uploaded by any such party to the Company’s service. This indicates data sharing with third parties.
reply.reference: Please also note that third-parties who provide and/or publish content via the Company’s Kajabi® Service shall be deemed the data controllers for any personal data contained in the content uploaded by any such party to the Company’s Kajabi® Service. This privacy policy only concerns the processing for which the Company is data controller. If you have any questions regarding personal data contained in the Third-Party Content, please contact the third-party provider responsible for such Third Party Content. URL: https://www.dianabigham.com/pages/privacy-policy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: Third-party providers of content via the Company’s Kajabi® Service

extended_simple_answer.content: Third-party providers of content via the Company’s Kajabi® Service

reply.analysis: The privacy policy specifies that third-parties providing content via the Kajabi® Service are deemed data controllers for the personal data contained in their content, making them third parties with which data is shared.
reply.reference: Third-parties who provide and/or publish content via the Company’s Kajabi® Service shall be deemed the data controllers for any personal data contained in the content uploaded by any such party to the Company’s Kajabi® Service (“Third-Party Content”) and any other personal data processed in relation to such Third-Party Content. This privacy policy only concerns the processing for which the Company is data controller. If you have any questions regarding personal data contained in the Third-Party Content, please contact the third-party provider responsible for such Third Party Content. URL: https://www.dianabigham.com/pages/privacy-policy
